title: Diorama Builder - Medieval Castle
description: This expansion of DIORAMA BUILDER brings the diorama "MEDIEVAL CASTLE", which will allow you to assemble a complete Medieval Castle, with a royal bedroom, weapons room, prison, main hall, kitchen and everything with lots of details, such as armor, cannons, crossbows and more!
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Diorama Builder-1di7d](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/185a8e8f1d9a46a693d40a34c29a9d79/diorama-builder-1di7d.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
This expansion of **DIORAMA BUILDER** brings the diorama "**MEDIEVAL CASTLE**", which will allow you to assemble a complete Medieval Castle, with a royal bedroom, weapons room, prison, main hall, kitchen and everything with lots of details, such as armor, cannons, crossbows and much more!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
### **Quantity of pieces \ Series**

<!--image-->
![Diorama Builder-1ttxx](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/185a8e8f1d9a46a693d40a34c29a9d79/diorama-builder-1ttxx.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Below we will describe some of the details of the scenario that you will create in this diorama:

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
### **CASTLE HALL**

<!--image-->
![Diorama Builder-k3mek](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/185a8e8f1d9a46a693d40a34c29a9d79/diorama-builder-k3mek.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
The Castle Hall, where the armor guards its entrance and where the large table is located, with the king's throne, the chairs for the guests, and the abundant food for the banquet.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
### **CASTLE ROOM**

<!--image-->
![Diorama Builder-1v3ze](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/185a8e8f1d9a46a693d40a34c29a9d79/diorama-builder-1v3ze.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
The royal bedroom, with its large bed, covered by a beautiful veil, the bookshelf with stories of battles and reigns, chandeliers, curtain, mirror, and a large chest... what is inside it?

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
### **CASTLE KITCHEN**

<!--image-->
![Diorama Builder-pq2j0](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/185a8e8f1d9a46a693d40a34c29a9d79/diorama-builder-pq2j0.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
The kitchen, with its crockery and silverware, plenty of food, and everything necessary for the great royal banquets. In addition, a good supply of mead and of course, the mice couldn't be missing!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
### **CANNONS**

<!--image-->
![Diorama Builder-1r85d](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/185a8e8f1d9a46a693d40a34c29a9d79/diorama-builder-1r85d.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
The cannons are powerful weapons in the defense of the castle. And the coolest thing about being able to assemble them is that in interaction mode, you'll be able to fire them and see the big metal bullets fly across the scene.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
As with all other dioramas in **DIORAMA BUILDER**:

- THE **MUSIC IS ORIGINAL** and made exclusively for this diorama.
- When completing the diorama, animations will be automatically activated in the scene and **INTERACTION MODE** will be activated, giving you access to interact with it, clicking on several pre-defined places to see very cool animations.
- In **INTERACTION MODE** you can activate **NIGHT MODE**, turning on all the scene lights at once and thus being able to enjoy a very special view of the diorama.
- You will have new **ACHIEVEMENTS** for you to conquer!
